title: How to Start a Club on Stardoll

steps.headline: When you have 200 starpoints you can make a club.
Think about something you love, or have a passion for.
steps.description: It could be a type of animal, book, or even a website! Create the club with a suitable name for the topic you want to make it about. Call it something memorable. Take Animal_Lovers, for example. There's no annoying 'x's or random dots. It's simple!

steps.headline: Decide whether to have a public or private club.
steps.description: Public clubs automatically accepts all interested members, while private clubs allow you to decide on memberships through a case-by-case basis. You can share this responsibility with your Club managers.

steps.headline: Write a description of the Club for the presentation page.
steps.description: Choose a logo for the Club; choose a picture for Club; choose category tags so people can search for your Club. You can change and/or edit all of these later. After submitting an image, it may take days to be accepted and might be rejected but don't get discouraged and try again with a different picture in a few days.

text: Log on to your account.  When you have 200 starpoints you can make a club.  Go to clubs.  Click on start a club.  Think about something you love, or have a passion for. It could be a type of animal, book, or even a website! Create the club with a suitable name for the topic you want to make it about. Call it something memorable. Take Animal_Lovers, for example. There's no annoying 'x's or random dots. It's simple! Decide whether to have a public or private club. Public clubs automatically accepts all interested members, while private clubs allow you to decide on memberships through a case-by-case basis. You can share this responsibility with your Club managers. Write a description of the Club for the presentation page. Choose a logo for the Club; choose a picture for Club; choose category tags so people can search for your Club. You can change and/or edit all of these later. After submitting an image, it may take days to be accepted and might be rejected but don't get discouraged and try again with a different picture in a few days.
